channel.title: Alchemist Changes. (Suggestion) [Slight Nerf and buff?]
channel.description:
Reminder this is a suggestion made by me so It might not be perfect that's why you can comment on what you'd change.
**Alchemist** -Passive Coagulate, Immune to poisons/Bleeding.
**Day Ability** -Stone Skin, makes you immune that night (3 uses)
**Night Ability(s)** Crimson potion, now 3 uses. Emerald potion, now 2 uses. Truth potion, Not usable until N3, will only find faction even if bd, 2 uses. Tar Potion, 2 uses, gain occupy immunity while using tar.
I feel like this changes alch enough to make it on the same level as old alch, 3 emerald potions is one too many reducing healing and occupy makes you use it wisely, truth potion getting a Nerf is needed, bringing back stone skin so Alch is a use to the bd instead of worrying about themselves.
